nodes.text: Altoonian ale was a type of ale. When traveling to Kullgroon to smuggle weapons to an outpost so the Petrusians enslaved by the Galactic Empire there could gain their freedom, Lando Calrissian stated that they would have to power down the Millennium Falcon to appear as mere spacejunk to avoid being spotted by Imperial patrol ships. In response, L3-37 began to speak being cut off by Calrissian who threatened to swap her for a bottle of Altoonian ale if she said it.
